detailed_info.name: Coconut oil
detailed_info.description: Coconut oil is extracted from the flesh of the coconut. It is a source of fatty acids: it contains lauric acid, capric acid, myristic acid and palmitic acid. It penetrates the skin quickly and leaves a feeling of softness without any greasy effect on the skin. It is used in many cosmetic products: it has moisturizing, emollient, antioxidant properties ... it even protects (slightly) UV. It is allowed in organic.

functions.name: Hair conditioning
functions.description: Leaves hair easy to comb, soft, soft and shiny and / or confers volume, lightness and shine

functions.name: Masking
functions.description: Reduces or inhibits the odor or basic taste of the product

functions.name: Perfuming
functions.description: Used for perfume and aromatic raw materials
